name: 人格面具：陰影面積(Persona：Shadow)
description:
Disclaimer: The story of this game is based on the psychology of Jung and Freud, and is purely fictional.

Introduction

This is a side-scrolling game, Including stories, puzzles, battles, and collections.

Game elements

  • Rich stories and conversations.
  • Combine stories and puzzles.
  • Play different roles.
  • Normal battle and boss battle
  • Notes and paper collection

Story

Ego anomalies. How does the persona use mind power and solve shadow problems?
  • Persona: Persona is a Personality produced by the social environment.
  • Shadow: Contrary to persona, Shadow is a personality not recognized by ego.
Persona and shadow are subconscious managers, they must solve the problem of ego anomalies.

Description

Hello, my name is Yelu, thank you for following this game, whether you support my game or not, I hope to get your opinions.
